reviewText: I use a roku connection to view this movie and there was no audio. I went back to it a couple of times and no audio.
Ok but not you top notch Christmas movie.
Poor video quality, good story
Movie is in Black & White which is okay with me.  It's a family movie which I like but this movie just didn't hold my interest.
Cute early acting by Kidman.
Sorry to say I didn't make it all the way through this one.
thank you
My grandchildren enjoyed the movie. It's nice to watch good wholesome family movies .

I watched this around Christmas. I watched it with my Roku. It worked just fine no problems. I thought it was a good story. I think it is a good movie for the whole family. I enjoyed it! I would watch it again.

A down under take on Christmas in a time and area where life can be harsh. Bad guys were similar to Laurel and Hardy. But could be fun for a family to watch, especially if they have a fondness for horses.
Like the other reviewer, I am also on a Roku connection.  Please fix the audio because I really want to see this!

this is a 'strong' film from the 'antipodes'. the acting is 'outstanding' for a 'young' cast, but essentially the strong points go to the 'veteran' actors in the crew.
fun viewing for the whole 'family'.

I enjoyed it, but I'm a bit bias since I'm a fan of Nicole Kidman.  You can also watch a teen Kidman in the better adventure Aussie film "BMX Bandits" (1983) fighting baddies using her bicycling skills.
Slow and boring.
just as frightening as when i was a 6 year old iam 74 now really enjoyed it

interesting to see a vintage austrtalian film.  semi related to christmas.  this is a remake notable mainly for the credit  "Introducing Nicole Kidman"
not a particularly sharp image and there are color density changed throughout.  think "B movie" with even lower budget than you might expect.  still, it has its charms.  and is a christmas relted film i had never heard of.  might be time to watch the 1947 original of the same name this one i based on to see whet they liked/changed.
So uninteresting I couldn't even finish it.
Great to see Nicole Kidman before she started chain smoking.

Did not know until after I bought this there was a PRESSED dvd available from Echo Bridge for a cheaper price.  now comparing Quality..  okay I paid for the cover.  The cover is way better than the $6.99 Echo Bridge release which the way the cover is.  Could be confused for a 1940's film I've also looked at with the same name
a good clean movie and kept the kids attention.
great movie great buy  would purchase from seller again,reasonablely priced
